translations.translation: And anguish will be heaped upon anguish:
and calf is inter-twined with calf.
When legs are twisted around each other,
And one shin will curl up with the other shin.
And one shank will be joined with another shank.
And affliction is combined with affliction;
and leg is intertwined with leg,
And agony is heaped on agony;
when his legs are brought together [when affliction is combined with affliction];
And one shank is entangled with the other shank.
and each shank clasps the other shank,
And one leg will be joined with another:
And leg will be joined with another leg (shrouded)
and when leg is intertwined with leg,
And leg is entwined with leg.
And the leg is wound about the leg,

[75:29] and the shank is intertwined with the [other] shank, that is, one of his shanks [will be intertwined] with his other shank at the moment of death; or [it means] the distress of parting with this world is intertwined with the distress of the arrival of the Hereafter;

(And agony is heaped on agony) and severity is heaped upon severity: the severity of the last day of the life of the world and that of the first day of the Hereafter; and it is also said this means: and the dead person's legs are twisted around each other;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ } معناه شِدةُ الدُّنيا إلى شِدةِ الآخرةِ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما جزم بفراق الأحبة { ٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ } [القيامة: 29] أي: التولت ساقه باسقه من كمال ضجرته وأسفه، فلا يقدر حركتها وتحريكها
